name: BizOnTrack
overview:
BizOnTrack is a web-based team-based goal management and productivity software that helps your work team achieve goals and get results.

Main features include:

Team Goal Management

  • Set and track both business and personal goals
  • Align your team efforts with company goals
  • S.M.A.R.T. goal setting and progress tracking
  • Boost team productivity and employee motivation

Tasks and Time Tracking

  • Align daily tasks to support company goals
  • Team works together to achieve common goals
  • Track work hours and team performance
  • Integrate goal setting with action plans

Team Performance Reporting

  • At-a-glance view of goal progress and status
  • View performance on team and individual levels
  • Show full history of goal accomplishment
  • 3D charts on goal progress and time usage
